sentences.en: a theatre program
sentences.cn: 戏剧节目单

sentences.en: a word processing program
sentences.cn: 文字处理程序

sentences.en: Any large high-speed computer can be programmed to learn.
sentences.cn: 任何大型高速计算机都可以通过编程获得学习能力。

sentences.en: Finding a volunteer to write the computer program isn't a problem.
sentences.cn: 找个志愿者编这个计算机程序不成问题。

sentences.en: He uses tapes of this program to teach English.
sentences.cn: 他用这个节目的录像带教授英语。

sentences.en: If you don't like the program, just uninstall it and forget it.
sentences.cn: 如果不喜欢这个程序，把它卸载不用就行了。

sentences.en: It is possible to attach executable program files to e-mail.
sentences.cn: 可以在电子邮件里附上可执行程序文件。

sentences.en: Load the program into the computer.
sentences.cn: 把程序输入电脑。

sentences.en: Stanford University’s MBA program
sentences.cn: 斯坦福大学的工商管理硕士课程

sentences.en: The computer program searches, and bingo! We've got a match.
sentences.cn: 电脑程序在搜索，瞧！找到匹配的了。

sentences.en: The computer program was unable to discriminate between letters and numbers.
sentences.cn: 这计算机程序不能辨别字母与数字。

sentences.en: The outpatient program has a staff of six people.
sentences.cn: 门诊部有6名工作人员。

sentences.en: The program is geared around the problems of being a co-dependent.
sentences.cn: 这个节目关注共依存者面临的各种问题。

sentences.en: The program starts at 9 a.m.
sentences.cn: 节目上午9点开始。

sentences.en: The retrofit program will be carried out at the Montreal facilities.
sentences.cn: 蒙特利尔将要开展市政设施的翻新改良工程。

sentences.en: There are still a few residual problems with the computer program.
sentences.cn: 电脑程序还有一些残留问题。

sentences.en: This computer program can be integrated with existing programs.
sentences.cn: 这套计算机程序可以与现有的程序整合在一起.

sentences.en: This television program provoked a spirited debate in the United Kingdom.
sentences.cn: 这个电视节目在英国引起了激烈的辩论。

sentences.en: Who's behind this program?
sentences.cn: 谁支持这项计划?

sentences.en: You can preselect programmes you want to watch, and program your VCR to record them.
sentences.cn: 你可以预选想看的节目并预设录像机录下来。

words.tran_cn: 程序员，[计][自] 程序设计员
设计，规划；编制程序，[计] 程序编制

phrases.tran_cn: n. 发展计划；开发方案
n. 程序设计；程式设计

trans.tran_cn: 程序，节目，节目单，计划，安排
trans.tran_en: a set of instructions given to a computer to make it perform an operation

trans.tran_cn: [计]给…编写程序，为…制定计划，设计安排活动，编排
trans.tran_en: to give a computer a set of instructions that it can use to perform a particular operation
